entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning late in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 then becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
